name: SAGE (ReconTooth)
description:
Inspired by Mike's Adventure Game and The Elder Scrolls: Arena, this is a roguelike built around exploration and adventure. Can you find the Courageous Heart and help the Moon Goddess keep the forces of Chaos at bay? Or will you mauled by a moose?

Fair warning: This game is in beta! All of the planned features are implemented to an extent, but content (especially late-game stuff) might be a little lacking.
